action.action-desc: Mr. Welch (for himself, Mr. Clyburn, Mr. Courtney, and Mr. Yarmuth) submitted the following resolution; which was referred to the Committee on Rules

form.official-title: Amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to require that any extension of the public debt limit only be considered in a standalone bill.

section.text: That rule XXI of the Rules of the House of Representatives is amended by adding at the end the following new clause:

rules-clause.rules-clause-header: Consideration of public debt limit extension
rules-clause.text: It shall not be in order to consider any bill or joint resolution extending the limit on the public debt if such measure contains any other matter.
